com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.recovery

Class RecoveryStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.AbstractStep
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.DeploymentStep
        • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.recovery.RecoveryStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element, Interruptible, Step

    public class RecoveryStep
extends DeploymentStep
    An extension of DeploymentStep meant for use with DefaultRecoveryPlanManager.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: Step
        Starts the Step, whose Status should be Status.PENDING. This will continue to be called for as long as Element.isPending() returns true.

        See #updateOfferStatus(Collection<org.apache.mesos.Protos.Offer.Operation>) which returns the outcome of the PodInstanceRequirement

        Specified by:
        start in interface Step
        Overrides:
        start in class DeploymentStep
